title: Onam Festival Story
text: Onam is a celebration that brings people together, reminding us of harmony, prosperity, and cultural pride. The vibrant colors, traditional games, and joyful spirit reflect timeless values of our heritage.
name: Robert Fox

title: Great Experience
text: Armadam 2024, hosted by the 2021â€“2024 batch, was the first grand Onam celebration and a historic highlight of Sri Shanmugha College. With vibrant pookalam, graceful Thiruvathira, energetic performances, fun games, and delicious payasam, it united students and management in a joyful celebration, setting a benchmark for future events.
name: Fadal
